Chinese.Description: 扯线蜂窝激活后将不再产生蜜蜂，而是产生大量具有锁定功能的蜂巢导弹。导弹会造成少量爆炸伤害。当玩家吞下蜂巢后，将会以恒定频率生成蜂巢炸弹。

English.Description: Spore plant activation will no longer spawn bees, but instead spawn a large number of swarm missiles with a lock-on feature. The missiles will deal a small amount of explosive damage. When the player swallows the spore plant, it will spawn missiles at a constant frequency.
